title: R.I.P. Frank Heine 1964-2003

author: formlos

comments.content: What a loss Daliance is the face I use as my ID. Loved his work. I hope he is in a better place. Dan
Very sad. Another great talent gone too soon ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518122906im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)
